1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umm Salamah narrated:"The time of waiting for Nifas during the time of AIlah's Messenger was forty days. We used to cover our faces with reddish-brown Wars

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ تَمْكُثُ النُّفَسَاءُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Extent Of The Waiting During Nifas
